item.title: I Need Help With An Error!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:27, topic:507931”]yes i do have the correct models.

if(i == 1) { itemdef.name = "@bla@Black h'ween Mask"; itemdef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemdef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemdef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemdef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemdef.originalModelColors[0] = 926; //original color itemdef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 0; //changed color itemdef.modelID = 2438; itemdef.modelZoom = 730; itemdef.modelRotation1 = 516; itemdef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemdef.anInt165 = 3188; itemdef.anInt200 = 3192; itemdef.description = "Aaaarrrghhh... I'm a monster."; }[/quote]
You just stated you didn’t add wear models, then said you have the right wearing models. How would you even know?
is the H’ween going to the right wear slot?
Look around the player to see where it’s showing up.

Read full topic

It wasnt that :C I solved the issue for that :x Now the issue is, in the inv the h’ween is red and when i wear it my guys head is missing

Are the wear models correct?

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:18, topic:507931”]I added this into item.cfg:

But now when i try to spawn the item it says “item id does not exist”[/quote]

If it says this in your itemDef_2:
case 15282:

and you are trying to use this in your server:
item = 22000

I wonder why it’s not spawning.
You need to use the code from the item def.

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:15, topic:507931”]o, Sorry sk8, will try it right now, and if anyone can…Please help fix this:

Javafiles\ItemDef_2.java:1198: error: cannot find symbol
itemdef.Actions = new String[5];
^
symbol: variable Actions
location: variable itemdef of type ItemDef
Note: Javafiles\client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
facepalm…

item.title: I Need Help With An Error!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:13, topic:507931”]Can someone help me with these last 2 errors? I got most of them down.

Error:
Javafiles\ItemDef_2.java:1198: error: cannot find symbol
itemdef.Actions = new String[5];
^
symbol: variable Actions
location: variable itemdef of type ItemDef
Javafiles\ItemDef_2.java:1208: error: incompatible types
itemdef.description = “I’m A Monster”.getBytes();
^
required: String
found: byte[]
Note: Javafiles\client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
Or don’t read my code.

Read full topic

^

location: variable itemdef of type ItemDef

^
required: String
found: byte[]

item.title: I Need Help With An Error!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

this?

case 15282:
         itemdef.name = "@bla@Black h'ween Mask";
         itemdef.itemActions = new String[5];
         itemdef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
         itemdef.originalModelColors = new int[1];
         itemdef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1];
         itemdef.originalModelColors[0] = 926;  //original color
         itemdef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 0; //changed color
         itemdef.modelID = 2438;
         itemdef.modelZoom = 730;
         itemdef.modelRotation1 = 516;
         itemdef.modelRotation2 = 0;
         itemdef.anInt165 = 3188;
         itemdef.anInt200 = 3192;
         itemdef.description = "Aaaarrrghhh... I'm a monster.";
         break;

Read full topic
